attributes.action: Gareth Southgate to be on the new £50 note
attributes.background: Southgate needs to be on the new note because of the work he has done with the England squad, especially with their performances at the World Cup in Russia

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
